Open Mic Night

On the night of our wedding, between the cocktail hour post ceremony and the height of the festivities, we will be providing an opportunity to showcase and witness the vast talents of all our friends and family who will be joining us. Please consider performing something or joining in a group of people to perform! Of course, spontaneous submissions will be encouraged, but with only so much time to put on a show, we will only be able to have about 15 performances at a few minutes each.

Yes, I will perform
No, I'm lame
